name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Employee of the Month
name_original: SpongeBob SquarePants: Employee of the Month
description:
SpongeBob SquarePants: Employee of the Month is an adventure game developed by AWE Productions. It came out on 20-09-2002. THQ published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play SpongeBob SquarePants: Employee of the Month on PC.
